identity.description:
AI-powered tool that generates concise summaries of long tool outputs, emphasizing key information relevant to the original query.

AI-powered tool for summarizing long tool outputs, focusing on key information relevant to the original query
capabilities: Focuses on information relevant to original query

tool_output.description: The original tool output to be summarized

query_context.description: Context about the original query that triggered the tool

tool_name.description: Name of the tool that generated the output

focus_areas.description: Specific areas to focus on in the summary

max_length.description: Maximum length of the summary in characters

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
